channel.title: [UNSOLVED]-[317/DELTA] Quest Tab
channel.description:
hey guys ive started adding server information to my new 317, when i click anywhere on my quest tab it opens up one of these, it does this for everyone i click on:
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2ewyy68.png[/img]
How can i make it delete that and make it open nothing? also, How do i remove names of quests? From the list. MY SERVER HISTORY: i have made it from a blank soruce + Client.
thanks, i would rep but i dont have over 15:(

Okay thanks,
i went into client.java
searched CASE 185,
then deleted the ID: 3 and renamed to -1

so how do i remove names of other quests like
“RAG AND BONE MAN”???,when i search quest names it dose’nt come up with them in client.java

item.title: [UNSOLVED]-[317/DELTA] Quest Tab
item.dc:creator: @Maizez Maizez
item.description:
@Maizez wrote:

The interface opens because the clickingmost.java file is telling it to.

In that file, each case points to a certain object. You’ll just need to edit the code, or remove the code, to make it not open that quest interface.

The quest tab text can be set in your client.java file.
Here’s what I did:

	public void writeQuestTab() {
		/* TITLE */
		sendFrame126("@red@YOURSERVER Info", 640);
		sendFrame126("@gre@WELCOME: ", 641);
		/* FREE QUESTS */
		sendFrame126("", 7332);
		sendFrame126("", 7333);
		sendFrame126("", 7334);
		sendFrame126("", 7336);
		sendFrame126("", 7383);
		sendFrame126("", 7339);
		sendFrame126("", 7338);
		sendFrame126("", 7340);
		sendFrame126("", 7346);
		sendFrame126("", 7341);
		sendFrame126("", 7342);
		sendFrame126("", 7337);
		sendFrame126("", 7343);
		sendFrame126("", 7335);
		sendFrame126("", 7344);
		sendFrame126("", 7345);
		sendFrame126("", 7347);
		sendFrame126("", 7348);
		/*Members Quests*/
		sendFrame126("", 12772);
		sendFrame126("", 673);
		sendFrame126("", 7352);
		sendFrame126("", 17510);
		sendFrame126("", 7353);
